mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(article_id, member_id, parent_comment_id, content, register_date) VALUES(#{articleId}, #{memberId}, #{parentCommentId}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT c1.id id, c1.content content, c1.register_date register_date, c1.update_date update_date, c1.good good, c1.parent_comment_id parent_comment_id, CASE WHEN c1.parent_comment_id IS NULL THEN c2.content ELSE c2.content END AS reply_content, m2.email reply_writer, c2.register_date reply_register_date, c2.good reply_good, c2.id reply_id FROM comment c1 LEFT JOIN comment c2 ON c1.id = c2.parent_comment_id LEFT JOIN `member` m2 ON c2.member_id = m2.id WHERE c1.id = #{id} AND c1.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT c1.id id, c1.content content, c1.register_date register_date, c1.update_date update_date, c1.good good, m1.email writer, (select IF(cl.id,1,0) from comment_like cl where cl.member_id = #{memberId} and cl.comment_id = c1.id) AS `is_good`, CASE WHEN c1.parent_comment_id IS NULL THEN c2.content ELSE c2.content END AS reply_content, m2.email reply_writer, c2.register_date reply_register_date, c2.good reply_good, c2.id reply_id, (select IF(cl2.id,1,0) from comment_like cl2 where cl2.member_id = #{memberId} and cl2.comment_id = c2.id) AS `reply_is_good` FROM comment c1 LEFT JOIN comment c2 ON c1.id = c2.parent_comment_id LEFT JOIN `member` m1 ON c1.member_id = m1.id LEFT JOIN `member` m2 ON c2.member_id = m2.id WHERE c1.article_id = #{articleId} AND c1.parent_comment_id IS NULL ORDER BY c1.good DESC, c1.register_date ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comment WHERE id = ( SELECT `result` FROM ( SELECT if(count(c1.parent_comment_id)>0,0,#{id}) as `result` FROM comment c1 WHERE c1.parent_comment_id = #{id} ) c2 )
